answers.answer: Too little information to assist properly Erfdrizzle,,are your blood's under control?  Do you smoke,  do you drink alchohol?  Do you suffer thrush and urinary infections just as frequently as your sore throats?

Well my blood pressure is fine, definitely no heart or lung problems. I went to my specialist and everything seemed fine except for one thing. You see, I took the glucose fasting test and it came out low, then 2 hours later I drank a glucola and my sugar level went up high. My symptoms currently are sore throat, muscle weakness, chronic fatigue, increase of acne, face paleness, and it takes longer for my bruises to heal up. No I don't smoke, I drank beer once in a while BEFORE, but I was never an alcoholic. Doctor saids it's pre-diabetes. Does it sound right to you, or does it sound like someting else?

question: If you have pre-diabetes can you get sort throat once in a while, because I'm pre-diabetic and I currently got a sort throat.
title: More Diabetic questions
